ModMetaData.name: Gastronomy (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description:
Original mod by Orion https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2279786905 GNU General Public License All the same, if the original author requests it, I will remove this update.
packageID of Orion.Gastronomy has been retained for compatibility purposes. Please unsub from the original for 1.6
--
Original mod notes (1.5):
Gastronomy allows guests and (optionally) colonists to sit down and order their meals from a waiter.
Build a cash register to control opening times and what's on the menu.
It is recommended to have at least one colonist on forced work at every opened hour, to avoid patrons going hungry.
